fromXml

public void fromXml(Element sourceNode,
                    com.percussion.design.objectstore.IPSDocument parentDoc,
                    ArrayList parentComponents)
             throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Description copied from interface: IPSComponent
This method is called to populate an object from its XML representation. An element node may contain a hierarchical structure, including child objects. The element node can also be a child of another element node.

Each component should add itself to parentComponents before constructing its child components, and should restore the original parentComponents before returning.

Parameters:
sourceNode - the XML element node to populate from, not null .
parentDoc - may be null.
parentComponents - a collection of all the components created in the process of creating this component. May be null.
Throws:
PSUnknownNodeTypeException - if the XML element node does not represent a type supported by the class.

toXml

public Element toXml(Document doc)
Description copied from interface: IPSComponent
This method is called to create an XML element node with the appropriate format for the given object. An element node may contain a hierarchical structure, including child objects. The element node can also be a child of another element node.

Returns:
the newly created XML element node
See Also:
IPSComponent

validate

public void validate(com.percussion.design.objectstore.IPSValidationContext context)
              throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSValidationException
Description copied from interface: IPSComponent
Validates this object within the given validation context. The method signature declares that it throws PSValidationException, but the implementation must not directly throw any exceptions. Instead, it should register any errors with the validation context, which will decide whether to throw the exception (in which case the implementation of validate should not catch it unless it is to be rethrown).

Specified by:
validate in interface IPSComponent
Overrides:
validate in class PSComponent
Parameters:
context - The validation context.
Throws:
PSValidationException - According to the implementation of the validation context (on warnings and/or errors).
